attributes.action: Stop killings of innocent children in Syria.
attributes.background: Heartbreaking image of a five-year-old Syrian boy sitting bloodied and alone in the back of an ambulance has served as a shocking reminder of the brutality of the conflict.

rejection.details:
Petitions must ask for an action which is clear and within the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament to achieve.

If you wanted the UK to pressurise the fighting forces in Syria to cease airstrikes or targeting of civilians (including civilian children) you could start a new petition asking the Government to take this action.
